data.value: Template {0} ({1}) is malformed. The following template parameters are invalid:

data.name: ParseChoiceTemplateOption_ErrorText_InvalidChoiceValue
data.value: value '{0}' is not allowed, allowed values are: {1}

data.value: no choices are defined for parameter
data.comment: the error message is part of other sentence, no punctuation is needed
